decks.notes: The main strategy of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal spells, and board wipes while using Narset, Enlightened Master as the commander to generate card advantage and potentially win the game through extra turn spells or powerful planeswalkers like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck is built around maintaining control of the board and disrupting the opponent's game plan by countering their spells and removing their threats. It also includes card draw and manipulation spells to ensure a consistent stream of answers and threats. The goal is to outvalue the opponent and ultimately control the game until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through various spells and abilities while using Maelstrom Wanderer as the commander to provide additional value and card advantage. The deck includes a mix of ramp, board wipes, removal, and card draw to disrupt opponents and maintain control of the battlefield. Cards like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon, Primeval Titan, and Jace, the Mind Sculptor provide powerful effects that can swing the game in your favor. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Dragonlord Atarka and Inferno Titan to close out the game once you have established control. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents to secure victory in a 1 vs 1 duel.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through various artifacts and spells to disrupt the opponent's strategies while generating value through Daretti, Scrap Savant's ability. It aims to ramp up mana quickly with mana rocks like Worn Powerstone and Winter Orb, and then lock down the board with cards like Ensnaring Bridge and Tangle Wire. The deck also includes powerful board wipes like Obliterate and Jokulhaups to reset the game if needed. By utilizing cards like Memory Jar and Goblin Welder, the deck can constantly recycle resources and out-value the opponent. Additionally, it aims to punish opponents with cards like Blood Moon and Ruination to gain a strategic advantage.

The deck is centered around utilizing Meren of Clan Nel Toth's ability to constantly bring creatures back from the graveyard to the battlefield. It focuses on a combo strategy, using cards like Necrotic Ooze, Phyrexian Devourer, and Triskelion to create infinite loops and deal lethal damage to opponents. The deck also includes various creatures and spells that help with graveyard recursion and ramp, such as Eternal Witness, Birthing Pod, and Green Sun's Zenith. Additionally, there are disruption elements like Thoughtseize and Toxic Deluge to control the board and protect the combo. Overall, the key concept of the deck is to set up powerful creature combos and outvalue opponents with constant graveyard recursion and resource advantage.

The deck focuses on utilizing Animar, Soul of Elements as the commander to power out a powerful combo strategy. It includes a variety of creatures and spells that provide mana acceleration, card draw, and combo pieces to quickly build up Animar's counters and cast game-winning spells. The main strategy is to leverage Animar's ability to reduce the cost of creature spells and use cards like Peregrine Drake and Cloudstone Curio to generate infinite mana and creature loops. By assembling these combos and maintaining a board presence with creatures like Mulldrifter and Primeval Titan, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a powerful and resilient win condition.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the aggressive abilities of Marath, Will of the Wild as the commander to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes a mix of ramp, removal, and powerful creatures to support this strategy. Cards like Survival of the Fittest, Sunpetal Grove, and Stoneforge Mystic help set up the battlefield, while creatures like Scavenging Ooze, Reclamation Sage, and Flametongue Kavu provide utility and disruption. The deck aims to apply pressure early on and maintain momentum throughout the game with a combination of efficient creatures and powerful synergies, ultimately overwhelming the opponent before they can stabilize or mount a defense.

This deck focuses on utilizing various combo pieces and graveyard recursion to assemble powerful synergies and win conditions. With Sidisi, Undead Vizier as the commander, the deck includes powerful cards like Griselbrand, Necromancy, and Reanimate to bring back key creatures from the graveyard. It also includes efficient tutors like Demonic Tutor and Grim Tutor to search for combo pieces quickly. The deck aims to control the game with removal spells like Toxic Deluge and Thoughtseize while ramping with mana rocks like Worn Powerstone and Dark Ritual. Ultimately, the goal is to combo off with cards like Necrotic Ooze and Phyrexian Devourer to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble powerful combos using Sidisi, Undead Vizier as the commander. The deck includes various cards that support a combo strategy, such as reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead, tutors like Demonic Tutor and Rhystic Tutor, and graveyard recursion cards like Yawgmoth's Will. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn, as well as removal spells and disruption to control the game until the combo can be assembled. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes lands like Cabal Coffers and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth. Ultimately, the goal is to efficiently combo off and win the game quickly.
